argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_0z | |- 0 e. ZZ |
| 2 |  | #P_2z | |- 2 e. ZZ |
| 3 |  | #P_0le2 | |- 0 <_ 2 |
| 4 |  | #P_eluz2 | |- ( 2 e. ( ZZ>= ` 0 ) <-> ( 0 e. ZZ /\ 2 e. ZZ /\ 0 <_ 2 ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_mpbir3an | |- 2 e. ( ZZ>= ` 0 ) |
\
 2 is an integer greater than or equal to 0.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 8-Jun-2018.)  Obsolete version of ~ 2eluzge0 as of 25-Mar-2020.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
